post.body: That's terrible. Typical Irish Rail car parks, it's like you're paying for NOTHING. Often see smashed windows at Leixlip.
Well, I'm off to post some red envelopes.
That actually make sense. They're finishing off their bottles!
*waves at Mamo Davis* Hiya!
Good luck! :)
LMAO. Oh god, I need more male friends.
Imagine all the times O2 are mentioned on twitter re: iphone etc., if @Talk2O2 chimed in I think it would be of benefit.
Just the mention of ID makes me squirm. Thanks for the heads up.
2 letters away from Hogwarts *sigh*
You mean, you don't want support issues being indexed by google? And would rather discuss issues in a moderated forum. Hmm.
I haven't played Spore yet, been waiting until I had more free time. No good, eh?
I'm 100% asking Santa for the Astronomy Ireland Beginnerâ€™s Evening Classes, but next year, when college is over. Heh.
It certainly IS teasing me.
Surprisingly good actually. haha.
Bad news, but thank god you weren't one of them.
Obviously! Yes. Must check out London, try get that cheap day trip I've been harping on about forever.
We can go for a nice coffee/pint before or after in the cineworld bar :) you bringing Niamh?
I'm a RAM fan! :)
Thanks for the add :)
Morning! Hope you had a lovely Christmas.
Thought you were on at 10.30? :( guess who got given a dab radio for Christmas. I'll never miss hour of deadly again.
Aww! *hugs*
Handsome! I'm sorry I missed you. Am tweeting from the mobile. Hope you'd fun with your new toy. x
*blush* thanks, that's my i-feel-stupid-voice.
You won't answer your phone because you're baking me a cake? Makes sense!
Ha! Ditto.
A half hour less of Rick? This displeases me. Have a lovely Christmas x
Feeling any better? Hope the beard is still intact. Rumour has it that they're making a comeback via @rickoshea 's face.
Unless your name is on every single one NOM NOM NOM
Little brother is sitting beside me eating chipper chips. Good sign for you, me thinks.
What is it about Christmas time and girls wearing too much perfume. Overpowering scents make me feel ill.
Top 10 science gifts http://tinyurl.com/5d3jh6 WANT.
It's so odd that FB chat works for me in work. This is new and weird.
It's only when you're actually using a comp with 4GB ram that you realise how much of a difference it really makes to web surfing.
Sitting at @jentertainment 's new iMac. Seriously, gorgeous. It's cute little sounds remind me of a tummy rumbling.
Happy Christmas twitter. There needs to be a tweetup soon! Love you all my funny friends.
Just discovered the optical ZOOM on the flip. Niiice.
Time to put the laptop away. Goodbye Internets. Don't know when I'll see you again. x
New blog post "Santa Pat and Mulley the Elf" http://tinyurl.com/7xmnwc
Cappuccino Jelly Bean... yuk! These gourmet jelly beans always make me feel like I'm in Harry Potter.
